title: SEL-Integrated Teaching Methodology Workshop for Novice Teachers to Overcome Socio-Emotional Challenges

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A program for cultivating in-company science education specialists, requiring case-based instruction grounded in actual teaching experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core elements of social-emotional learning (SEL) and suggest at least three strategies for integrating them into science lessons.
Learners can analyze potential student conflict situations during classes and propose SEL-based resolution approaches.
Learners can develop and execute specific communication plans to strengthen parent-teacher collaboration.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
